name: Starlight 自動OG生成 + Cloudflare Pages CI 最小
description: SharpでOG画像を生成し、Cloudflare Pagesへデプロイする最小CIテンプレート。

files.template:
name: Build Starlight with OG and Deploy to CF Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch: {}

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run og:gen
      - run: npm run build
      - name: Publish to Cloudflare Pages
        uses: cloudflare/pages-action@v1
        with:
          apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          accountId: {{account_id}}
          projectName: {{project_name}}
          directory: dist
          gitHubToken: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

---
title: Introduction
---

# {{title}}

<meta property="og:image" content="/og/index.png"/>

> CIで `npm run og:gen` 実行後にビルドし、Cloudflare Pagesにデプロイします。
